title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 172.2 - Regulation of activities and moneys
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 172.2 - Regulation of activities and moneys

State Regulations

The board of education of each school district having a
population of less than one million and an educational program beyond the 6th
grade shall make rules and regulations for the establishment, conduct, operation, and maintenance of extraclassroom activities and for the
safeguarding, accounting and audit of all moneys received. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
172.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
